title: Linux and AI
description: Explore the intersection of Linux and artificial intelligence through our weekly online discussions and online chat rooms.

title: Luma Calendar
description: View, and subscribe, to our Luma Calendar to stay updated on all our upcoming events, workshops, and community gatherings.

title: Install Fests
description: Install fests are back! Learn how to get notified about upcoming install fests, and how to get involved in helping out at them.

title: Linux and Gaming Group
description: Join our Linux and Gaming working group to explore the latest in gaming on Linux, share tips, and participate in gaming events.
